page.title: 18Home Luxury Goods.
page.content:
Part of our Survey sought to find out the extent of ownership of luxury goods and appliances in the homes of Pontrhydyfen. We found that the residents of the village were well up with modern-day technology as the following statistics show:
All homes possessed a television set of which, 75% were colour and 17% had teletext. In addition many homes also possessed additional colour and black and white sets. 6% owned a home computer. 34% owned a Sterio hi-fi. 18% owned a microwave oven. 11% owned a video. 66% owned a washing machine. 19% owned a tumble drier. 2% owned a dishwasher.(Though two houses also included the husband!)
